attributes.action: Stop wasting money funding the RAF drill team and their light display
attributes.additional_details:
We all feel that no money should be spent funding this endeavour and the RAF should be instructed to stop.

The Naafi won't guard itself and they should go back to what they do best, training for the battle of bastion
attributes.background:
Recently there have been videos of a shocking drill team from the RAF regiment doing a light display similar to something you would expect to see it a steps concert. 

It degrading to the services and makes us look a joke. Especially at a time when the Russians are knocking on the door of Ukraine

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about duties or particular regiments are an operational matter for the RAF not the UK Government or Parliament.
